languages.text: "…его гнев и разочарование меня не волнуют. Ошибка Войгтвира стоила мне слишком многого. Годы трудов и огромные траты — все впустую. Он провалился в том, в чем должен был быть безупречен — упустил шпиона в рядах старших офицеров. Я не собираюсь от него избавляться — Кунрад служил слишком долго, чтобы его устранение прошло безболезненно для протектората. Вдобавок он не глупец — он не мог всерьез рассчитывать на наследство фон Валанциус, когда его способности и таланты столь нужны на позиции Мастера шепотов. Будем считать, что отлучение от линии наследования будет унизительным, но формальным уроком, из которого он сделает нужные выводы…"

"...his chagrin is irrelevant. Voigtvir's mistake cost me too much. Years of work, tremendous resources, all wasted. He has failed at what he was supposed to be irreproachable at — uncovering spies, and this one was a senior officer. I am not about to discard him — Kunrad has served me for too long for his removal to go painlessly for the protectorate. Besides, he is no fool. He could not have seriously expected to become the next in the von Valancius line when his skills and talents as Master of Whispers are so valuable. Let his disinheritance serve as a humiliating but instructive lesson from which he may yet learn..."
languages.original_text: "…его гнев и разочарование меня не волнуют. Ошибка Войгтвира стоила мне слишком многого. Годы трудов и огромные траты — все впустую. Он провалился в том, в чем должен был быть безупречен — упустил шпиона в рядах старших офицеров. Я не собираюсь от него избавляться — Кунрад служил слишком долго, чтобы его устранение прошло безболезненно для протектората. Вдобавок он не глупец — он не мог всерьез рассчитывать на наследство фон Валанциус, когда его способности и таланты столь нужны на позиции Мастера шепотов. Будем считать, что отлучение от линии наследования будет унизительным, но формальным уроком, из которого он сделает нужные выводы…"

traits.locale_text: "...his chagrin is irrelevant. Voigtvir's mistake cost me too much. Years of work, tremendous resources, all wasted. He has failed at what he was supposed to be irreproachable at — uncovering spies, and this one was a senior officer. I am not about to discard him — Kunrad has served me for too long for his removal to go painlessly for the protectorate. Besides, he is no fool. He could not have seriously expected to become the next in the von Valancius line when his skills and talents as a Master of Whispers are so valuable. Let his disinheritance serve as a humiliating formality from which he may yet learn..."

languages.text: 「…彼の悔しさなど関係ない。ボイトヴィルの失敗で、私も多くのものを失った。長年にわたる仕事、数多くの資源、すべてが無駄になった。彼は、スパイの暴露という―文句のつけようがない職務に失敗した。しかも、彼は上級士官だった。私は彼を解任するつもりはない―クンラッドは、長きに渡って私に仕えてくれた。彼を失うことは、保護領にとっても痛手となるだろう。それに、彼は愚かではない。囁きの主としての技術と才能がこれほどに価値あるものである以上、彼はフォン・ヴァランシウスの次の後継となることなど、本気で思ってなどいなかったはずだ。彼にとって継承の剥奪は屈辱的かもしれないが、教訓となってくれるはずだ…」
languages.original_text: "...his chagrin is irrelevant. Voigtvir's mistake cost me too much. Years of work, tremendous resources, all wasted. He has failed at what he was supposed to be irreproachable at — uncovering spies, and this one was a senior officer. I am not about to discard him — Kunrad has served me for too long for his removal to go painlessly for the protectorate. Besides, he is no fool. He could not have seriously expected to become the next in the von Valancius line when his skills and talents as Master of Whispers are so valuable. Let his disinheritance serve as a humiliating but instructive lesson from which he may yet learn..."

traits.locale_text: 「…彼の悔しさなど関係ない。ボイドヴィルの失敗で、私も多くのものを失った。長年にわたる仕事、数多くの資源、すべてが無駄になった。彼は、スパイの暴露という、申し分ない職務に失敗した。しかも、彼は上級士官だった。私は彼を解任するつもりはない ― クンラッドは、長きに渡って私に仕えてくれた。彼を失うことは、保護領にとっても痛手となるだろう。それに、彼は愚かではない。囁きの主としての技術と才能がこれほどに価値あるものである以上、彼はフォン・ヴァランシウスの次の後継となることなど、本気で思ってなどいなかったはずだ。彼にとって継承の剥奪は屈辱的かもしれないが、教訓となってくれるはずだ…」

languages.text: “……他的懊恼无关紧要，维特威尔的失误让我付出了惨重的代价。这么多年的努力，为此付出的许多资源，全都白白浪费了。他本该万无一失地发现敌人的间谍，更何况这名间谍还是船上的高阶军官，可他却失败了。我并不打算抛弃他，昆拉德已经为我效力了很久。如果把他赶走，肯定会对冯·瓦兰修斯王朝造成相当的影响。另外，他也不蠢，他身为低语之主的能力对王朝极其重要。他应该也明白，他不太可能真的成为王朝的继承人。不如剥夺他的继承权，让他从这个充满羞辱但不无裨益的惩罚中吸取教训……”
languages.original_text: "...his chagrin is irrelevant. Voigtvir's mistake cost me too much. Years of work, tremendous resources, all wasted. He has failed at what he was supposed to be irreproachable at — uncovering spies, and this one was a senior officer. I am not about to discard him — Kunrad has served me for too long for his removal to go painlessly for the protectorate. Besides, he is no fool. He could not have seriously expected to become the next in the von Valancius line when his skills and talents as Master of Whispers are so valuable. Let his disinheritance serve as a humiliating but instructive lesson from which he may yet learn..."

traits.locale_text: “……他的懊恼无关紧要，维特威尔的失误让我付出了惨重的代价。这么多年的努力，为此付出的许多资源，全都白白浪费了。他本该万无一失地发现敌人的间谍，更何况这名间谍还是船上的高阶军官，可他却失败了。我并不打算抛弃他，昆拉德已经为我效力了很久。如果把他赶走，肯定会对冯·瓦兰修斯王朝造成相当的影响。另外，他也不蠢，他身为低语之主的能力对王朝极其重要。他应该也明白，他不太可能真的成为王朝的继承人。不如剥夺他的继承权，让他从这个充满羞辱但不无裨益的惩罚中吸取教训……”

languages.text: « ... sa déception est sans importance. L'erreur de Voigtvir m'a trop coûté. Des années de travail, tant de ressources... perdues. Il a échoué là où il était censé exceller. Il n'a pas su découvrir qui était l'espion, quand bien même celui-ci était un officier supérieur. Je ne compte pas m'en débarrasser. Kunrad m'a servi pendant bien trop longtemps pour que sa suppression passe sans incident auprès du protectorat. Et puis, il n'est pas stupide. Il ne pensait certainement pas devenir le prochain héritier de la lignée von Valancius alors que ses talents de maître des murmures sont si précieux. Que son exhérédation, aussi humiliante soit-elle, lui serve de leçon... »
languages.original_text: "...his chagrin is irrelevant. Voigtvir's mistake cost me too much. Years of work, tremendous resources, all wasted. He has failed at what he was supposed to be irreproachable at — uncovering spies, and this one was a senior officer. I am not about to discard him — Kunrad has served me for too long for his removal to go painlessly for the protectorate. Besides, he is no fool. He could not have seriously expected to become the next in the von Valancius line when his skills and talents as Master of Whispers are so valuable. Let his disinheritance serve as a humiliating but instructive lesson from which he may yet learn..."

traits.locale_text: "... sa déception est sans importance. L'erreur de Voigtvir m'a trop coûté. Des années de travail, tant de ressources... perdues. Il a échoué là où il était censé exceller. Il n'a pas su découvrir qui était l'espion, quand bien même celui-ci était un officier supérieur. Je ne compte pas m'en débarrasser. Kunrad m'a servi pendant bien trop longtemps pour que sa suppression passe sans incident auprès du protectorat. Et puis, il n'est pas stupide. Il ne pensait certainement pas devenir le prochain héritier de la lignée von Valancius alors que ses talents de maître des murmures sont si précieux. Que son exhérédation, aussi humiliante soit-elle, lui serve de leçon... »

languages.text: «... su disgusto es irrelevante. El error de Voigtvir me ha costado demasiado. Años de trabajo, cantidades inmensas de recursos, y todo echado a perder. Ha fallado en la única tarea en la que se supone que debe ser infalible: desenmascarar espías. Y este era un oficial de alto rango. No tengo intención de deshacerme de él, Kunrad lleva demasiado tiempo a mi servicio como para que su expulsión sea indolora para el protectorado. Además, no es tonto. No podía esperar convertirse en sucesor del linaje von Valancius cuando sus habilidades y talentos como maestro de susurros son tan valiosos. Espero que al desheredarle aprenda de una humillante lección...».
languages.original_text: "...his chagrin is irrelevant. Voigtvir's mistake cost me too much. Years of work, tremendous resources, all wasted. He has failed at what he was supposed to be irreproachable at — uncovering spies, and this one was a senior officer. I am not about to discard him — Kunrad has served me for too long for his removal to go painlessly for the protectorate. Besides, he is no fool. He could not have seriously expected to become the next in the von Valancius line when his skills and talents as Master of Whispers are so valuable. Let his disinheritance serve as a humiliating but instructive lesson from which he may yet learn..."

traits.locale_text: «... su disgusto es irrelevante. El error de Voigtvir me ha costado demasiado. Años de trabajo, cantidades inmensas de recursos, y todo echado a perder. Ha fallado en la única tarea en la que se supone que debe ser infalible: desenmascarar espías. Y este era un oficial de alto rango. No tengo intención de deshacerme de él, Kunrad lleva demasiado tiempo a mi servicio como para que su expulsión sea indolora para el protectorado. Además, no es tonto. No podía esperar convertirse en sucesor del linaje von Valancius cuando sus habilidades y talentos como maestro de susurros son tan valiosos. Espero que al desheredarle aprenda de una humillante lección...».

languages.text: "... sein Unmut ist irrelevant. Voigtvirs Fehler kostet mich zu viel. Jahrelange Arbeit, enorme Ressourcen, alles futsch. Er hat auf einem Feld versagt, auf dem er als tadellos galt ... bei der Enttarnung von Spionen und dieser hier war ein leitender Offizier. Ich habe nicht vor, ihn abzusetzen ... Kunrad hat mir zu lange gedient, als dass seine Entfernung für das Protektorat folgenlos bliebe. Abgesehen davon ist er kein Narr. Er kann nicht ernsthaft erwartet haben, der Nächste in der Valancius-Linie zu werden, wo seine Fähigkeiten und Talente als Meister des Geflüsters so wertvoll sind. Möge seine Enterbung eine demütigende aber aufschlussreiche Lektion sein, aus der er etwas lernt ..."
languages.original_text: "...his chagrin is irrelevant. Voigtvir's mistake cost me too much. Years of work, tremendous resources, all wasted. He has failed at what he was supposed to be irreproachable at — uncovering spies, and this one was a senior officer. I am not about to discard him — Kunrad has served me for too long for his removal to go painlessly for the protectorate. Besides, he is no fool. He could not have seriously expected to become the next in the von Valancius line when his skills and talents as Master of Whispers are so valuable. Let his disinheritance serve as a humiliating but instructive lesson from which he may yet learn..."

languages.text: "Üzüntüsü bir şey ifade etmiyor. Voigtvir'in hatası pahalıya mal oldu. Yılların emeği, tonlarca kaynak, hepsi çöpe gitti. Casusların maskesini düşürmek gibi kusursuz olması gereken bir alanda başarısız oldu. Üstelik bu seferki kıdemli bir subaydı. Ama onu öylece silip atacak da değilim. Kunrad, ihracı protektora için acısız olamayacak kadar uzun süredir hizmetimde. Ayrıca ahmak da değil. Fısıltı Üstadı olarak hünerleri bu denli kıymetliyken von Valancius soyunun sıradaki başı olacağını düşündüğünü hiç sanmıyorum. Mirastan mahrum bırakılması, burnunu sürterek bir türlü alamadığı o dersi almasını sağlar umarım..."
languages.original_text: "...his chagrin is irrelevant. Voigtvir's mistake cost me too much. Years of work, tremendous resources, all wasted. He has failed at what he was supposed to be irreproachable at — uncovering spies, and this one was a senior officer. I am not about to discard him — Kunrad has served me for too long for his removal to go painlessly for the protectorate. Besides, he is no fool. He could not have seriously expected to become the next in the von Valancius line when his skills and talents as Master of Whispers are so valuable. Let his disinheritance serve as a humiliating but instructive lesson from which he may yet learn..."
